testcase.name: oradb::prepareautostart Linux CentOS should contain Exec[enable service oracle] with command => "chkconfig --add oracle", require => "File[/etc/init.d/oracle]", user => "root", unless => "chkconfig --list | /bin/grep 'oracle'", path => "/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:" and logoutput => true
